divs: sighting detailswell me and my sister were headed to her place in moorehead from my mothers in crookston we were on highway 75 we first saw it near an air plane than with out banking or anything it started toward the highway from over by hector air port it hovered we stopped the car didn't get out of car i think it was lost my self and we been afraid to talk about we don't want people to think we are crazy ya know i am 39 nine years old now on nov. 18 and you got to remember we got minot airforce base and grand forks air force and when it took off it was fast and didn't head into any of the nearby airforce bases it headed off to the south west and it was fast no noise but this thing was enormous bigger than 3 cars it appearea to be able to move in any direction meaning it didn't have to turn to a certain direction to fly off and it moved fast we watched it fly over to the highway wondered what the hell is this all of a sudden it was over us um that's about it good luck and keep the good work goin pretty we will be able to prove the existence more than none have seen this other worldly stuff and what i saw was other worldly it hovered over car i looked out my window rolled it down no cell phone cameras than thank you, *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg). sorry i can't speak for my sister
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
trends: There have been no other sightings in Crookston
